name: Chess
description: Chess is an unlicensed chess game. It is unknown whether it has any relation to the unreleased Sega Channel game Chessmaster. The game closely simulates realistic chess games. The chess board, which is 3D by default, can be customized for a top-down view and the setting to have white or black at the bottom. Options include the ability to turn off sound and music. The game can be played against the computer or another player. The difficulty level for the computer opponent can be determined from one to eleven.
